column4: Does anyone know where I can change settings so that I can hear sounds using headphones ?
Do you mean the speaker icon in the bottom right?
I don't have a speaker butten on the bottom.
Or top, where ever your system tray is.
yes, but I can't find where I can change (or whatever I have to do) the device to use for sounds
Or headphones are not in the list
Are you talking about system souhnds or general sounds?
General sounds. I looked at "Sound preferences"
It works when I not use the headphones
Just click on the speaker icon, and drag it down, that should lower the sound.
I don't want to lower the sound, I want to hear something. I don't hear anything
Are you sure that your 3.5mm jack is not messed up?
No, I'm not sure. What is that ?
The port you are plugging your earphones in. What you can also try is go under output, and see if pushing that slider to the right even more does anything.
No problem, I'm sorry I coulf not figure it out.
